text: <@U6G90R56F> has joined the channel
Fabian, this is where we talk about dev
Ok, very nice! Hello everyone :slightly_smiling_face:

<@U6G90R56F> how do you want to go about doing this? the authors at edhrec hang out here and we have quite the audience in this slack. i was thinking we could start a google spreadsheet and crowdsource it from our colleagues?
I'm down for that
i think before doing that we need to come up with the columns we need-- and to know that we need to nail down the design of the feature a bit more
so the way this will work from the backend at least

```
postgres=# SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT url, COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT url, card FROM cards WHERE card='Sanguine Bond' OR card='Exquisite Blood') a GROUP BY url) b WHERE count=2;
 count 
-------
  4608
(1 row)

Time: 25.996 ms
```
we have all the data (around 160k decks right now) in a postgres database

ok, sure. I think we can include the combos in the "themes" dropdown (which isn't visible on the homepage?). Just like with the actual themes, I suggest we group the combos into infinite life / mana / mill / damage / creatures and so on. When a visitor then goes into one of those categories, there are the most used one in that category (like sanguine bond/exquisite blood in lifegain)
<@U28TLDP0R> i noticed that today too, the front page’s menu needs to be updated
the front page is different now from the rest of the website
btw, keattz is GMT-8, I’m GMT-5
so he’s still sleepin
hmm i like the idea of separating out the combos into categories
do you think we should have one page with categories, or one separate page per category
depends on how many combos we have
seems like having one page per category would be good

I suggest a page like this: <https://edhrec.com/themes>

And then like this if you click on a category: <https://edhrec.com/themes/artifacts>

text: Instead of themes it then is Combos and instead of "Artifact" it could be Infinite Mill
hmm
so the issue here is the artifacts page shows the decks that are classified as artifact decks
are you suggesting we show decks that have one of many infinite mill combos?
let’s call the Artifact page a “tally” page
because it shows a summary of decks
the tribal pages, commander pages, and card pages are tally pages

Actually (and I don't know if that's possible) I would have suggested that we look for certain combos (as in the code above) and then display the most used ones across all decks int eh category on the tally page.
yeah
thats what im thinking
so here’s how it’ll look
h/o
ok so the most basic way im thinking
- Combo Page

- Exquisite Bond / Explicit Blood (591 decks)
    - Mike / Trike (143 decks)
    - Basalt Monolith / Power Artifact (122 decks)
exactlsy
kk
then when you click on that, you get a “tally”p age that shows the summary for all decks that contain Mike / Trike.
ok, so the other option here that i like
there are another type of page on edhrec
there are the “top” lists
like <https://edhrec.com/top/artifacts>
and there we'd display the top combos across all decks and categories
well they would show the same information
they’d show Mike / Trike (143 decks) still
the difference is i think we don’t generate tally pages for the combos
just list the combos out
i don’t like that as much because i think people want to see which cmmanders play that combo
agreed
also you might have an “infinite death trigger” combo and see what other things are played w/ it to close out the game
kk

I think a general infinite "ETB / dies / LTB" combo is better. Blood Artist is a "dies" trigger but you can also win with Altar of the Brood through inf. ETB's. Usually all three (ETB/dies/LTB) happen during such a combo
yeah
one thing i was thinking
what about lumping together all game ending combos together?
it doesn’t really matter what it does
like i dont think it matters that mike and trike do damage, and that ex blood and sanguine bond drain life
<@U286Q175Y>, it might be backend stuff, but Steven had an idea for general site users to tag cards by archetype and combo piece.
yeah id love to get the user piece to this but that’s so far away

So, you imagine
 - Combo Page
  - Most played combos across all decks
   - Commanders that play that combo
?
well the last leaf would be a tally page
it would show the commanders at the top, then below the signature/top/etc. cards
Right, I understand.
one thing i’d like to ahve… and this would be a pain in the ass honestly, but probably worth it
i’d like to filter the combos by color identity
Well, this is a EDH resource page after all, I think it makes sense
oh man i just had a good idea
let's hear it! :smile:

I run Alesha with like 15

but lots of cards are similar
Arcum Daggson

on all the pages
arcume daggson, alesha, wahtever

so we’d have a new section that shows the combos played in that deck
maybe under signature cards

so like, you’d have alesha page, then it would say    Mikeaus / Triskelion (12% of 252 decks, +23% synergy)
that math doesn’t work but yeah

text: might not be many examples in there

alright from an implementation perspective this is what im thinking
to recap
i change `tally` to split out combos
we change the page to generate a new combos section
(btw, combos iwll show up on tribal, theme, card, and commander pages)
we add a top combos section
we add combo specific pages (tally pages for specific combos)
i wonder how long it’ll take before the “edhrec is killing commander” mafia to come after us on this one
Ok, this sounds good. So I'd do research into the top few hundred most played combos, so we can actually search for them?
yeah
on the combo tally pages i want a description on how to execute the combo
“play this first, then grab this, then do this”
some of the combos like the protean hulk and boonweaver ones are pretty wild
Can do.
you are familiar with json right?
How do you plan on displaying the combos?
somewhat familiar yeah
im thinking we’ll stack them
then when you click on the bunch it’ll take you to the combo page
we’ve never stacked more than two cards but i think its doable
Oh! I didn't even think about that! Great idea
so here is the information i need
- the cards that are part of the combo
- the category of combo
- a human description on how to execute the combo
I can do that. Is there like a cloud where I can put that stuff in a spreadsheet (like Google Drive)
yeah let me start it for ya
Thank you, that's how I imagined it
So, there are which "Type of Combo"? Game Ending, Infinte ETB/Dies/LTB?
yeah let’s come up with the categories
infinite mana is one
infinite card draw
game ending
ETB/Dies/LTB is a good one
infinite tokens
hmmmmmm
these cross combo combos are weird
like (Sword of the Paruns OR Umbral Mantle) x (any creature that taps for a lot mana)
right
with altar of dementia instead of goblin bombardment you can also win on the spot
i kind of want to just list them all out
I can do that
it’ll be a pain in the ass but i think it’ll make it easier
Does "Mill" count as game ending?
Because technically you only win on that player's upkeep
i could go either way
there is also self mill
let’s keep it separate from game ending
because you still need to handle eldrazi and stupid shit like that
ok
Infinite Turns and Infinite Combat Steps?
And how do we handle "any creature"?
i like those combo categories
look how i handled elvish archdruid + sword of the paruns
basically in the description i said you need 4 elves
very good
i think that’s ok when it doesn’t amtter what it is

we can have the cards separated by commas
on each line
if they are cross combos

like
